titleStmt.title: A spirit moving in the vvomen-preachers: or, Certaine quæres, vented and put forth unto this affronted, brazen-faced, strange, new feminine brood. Wherein they are proved to be rash, ignorant, ambitious, weake, vaine-glorious, prophane and proud, moved onely by the spirit of errour.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Shepheard, at the Bible in Tower-street, and William Ley, at Pauls Chaine neere Doctors Commons.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 23"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out and date altered to 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
